amendment.description: To strengthen the Justice for Victims of Trafficking Act by incorporating additional bipartisan amendments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1124, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 157.

action.text: Amendment SA 1124 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration CR: S2313; text: CR S2313) To strengthen the Justice for Victims of Trafficking Act by incorporating additional bipartisan amendments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1124 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1124, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 157.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1124, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 157.
